column2: [[1973]]) is the author of the Text-Adventure parody ''[[The Bridge of Catzad-Dum]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/catzad-dum.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 4 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=5 Meristation
